item.title: Biomedical Research Labs
item.description: Biomedical Engineering (BME) Labs Of course, the first place to start looking for biomedical research is the BME department.

item.title: Child Neurorehabilitation
item.description: In this project, we are developing an EMG-FES system for patients suffering from neurological trauma that predicts intent to move and then activates proper muscle groups

item.title: Drug Delivery through the Blood Brain Barrier with MSC Exosomes
item.description: In this project, we are testing whether exosomes are viable drug delivery candidate to bypass the blood brain barrier.

item.title: Low-Cost Drug Refrigeration
item.description: In this project, we are experimenting with new ways to refrigerate drugs

item.title: Needle Thoracostomy Training Tools with Haptic Feedback
item.description: In this project, haptic feedback surgical training devices to help medical trainees learn needle thoracostomy.

item.title: Soft Robotics for Wound Healing
item.description: In this project, we are developing a soft robotic that promote wound healing

item.title: Surgical Training Tools for Congenital Cardiac Surgery
item.description: In this project, we are creating surgical training tools that will more accurately simulate congenital cardiac surgery

item.title: Leukemia Detection
item.description: In this project, we created a neural network, portable microscope, and mobile app system to diagnose acute lymphocytic leukemia (ALL)

item.title: Seizure Detection
item.description: In this project, we created a low-cost EEG-based wearable seizure detection alarm system

item.title: Solar Powered Autoclave
item.description: In this project, we are developing solar powered autoclave that is both low-cost and sustainable

item.title: Ultrasonic Vision for the Visually Impaired
item.description: In this project, we designed a sonar-based visual aid device for the visually impaired

item.title: Arrhythmia Detection
item.description: In this project, we propose a wearable device coupled with a neural network for the diagnosis of cardiac arrhythmia

item.title: Malaria Detection
item.description: In this project, we implemented a deep learning malaria detection algorithm

item.title: Patient Health Monitor
item.description: In this project, we implemented a low-cost patient health monitor that displays bedside patient vital signs

item.title: Clinical Volunteering
item.description: Hospitals Ascension Seton & Dell Seton Opens July 1st for fall volunteering Need vaccination records and TB blood test St.

item.title: Emailing Professors for Research
item.description: Use this template to reach out to professors at UT or any other universities (yes, this actually works!
